text: Aru Herod to Tyre aru Sidon laga manu khan uporte bisi khong thakise. Etu karone taikhan joma hoi kene eke logote taike lok kori bole ahise. Taikhan Blastus koi kene Raja laga kaam kora ekjon ke kotha korise aru taikhan ke modot kori bole phuslai loise. Titia taikhan shanti thaki bole nimite mangise, kelemane taikhan laga desh te kha luwa kiman jai, sob etu raja laga desh pora he jai thakise.
